node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `polls` ( `polls_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `choices` text NOT NULL, `numbers` text NOT NULL, `gimmick` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `gimmickchoice` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `prologue` text, PRIMARY KEY (`polls_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: polls
